meanings.definition: The quality of being appropriate or suitable.
meanings.sent1: The fittingnesses of his outfit for the job interview impressed the hiring manager.
meanings.sent2: She carefully considered the fittingnesses of her words before speaking at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The fittingnesses of wearing a swimsuit to a snowstorm would be quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The fittingnesses of a puzzle piece in the wrong spot can disrupt the whole picture.
meanings.sent5: The fittingnesses of a key in a lock is like finding the perfect match.

meanings.definition: The state of being fitting or proper.
meanings.sent1: The fittingnesses of the dress for the occasion made her feel confident.
meanings.sent2: He questioned the fittingnesses of the decision to cancel the event at the last minute.
meanings.sent3: The fittingnesses of wearing a crown to the grocery store would be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The fittingnesses of a square peg in a round hole is a classic example of mismatch.
meanings.sent5: The fittingnesses of a jigsaw puzzle coming together is so satisfying.
